data.text: @JWrod78 Yeah, living in Texas and working in the oil & gas industry has really done a number on your humanity. I wish you better as you grow and mature, one day.

@JWrod78 @Robinwi41491053 so what you’re saying is that you’ve based your entire opinion on a virus that has affected millions worldwide on the experiences of 100 people whose experience with the virus aligns with what you already believe

@JWrod78 There are many healthy people contracting Covid & dying or spending many months in the hospital with lung & brain damage. The variants are far worse. I listen to the nurses & doctors I follow on twitter & know in my personal life. I am smart enough to listen to professionals.
@JWrod78 I am originally from Houston. Do you realize that Houston predominantly votes liberal like all the cities in Texas?

@JWrod78 You don't believe that your city had a crisis when the morgues & hospitals had no more space to store all the bodies. If you think that was fake then you really are dealing with a low IQ. You should stay out of discussions about science or medicine. I am embarrassed for you.

@JWrod78 Why did Houston have to use refrigerated trucks to store bodies when the morgues were all full of people that died from a disease that you think is almost possible to die from? HISD needs to teach critical thinking skills.

@JWrod78 Yes, God forbid should you do what's best for society. There are people who fall into the other categories who WILL die if you transmit the virus. I guess just let them bite it or stay inside, isolated, indefinitely. Maybe reach out to your sky daddy for some advice.
